This is the #30Rock sequel I never knew I wanted. #TheGoodWife

Yes Lamont is a drug dealer. BAAAAD. But I do love how this good looking Black man in a LOVELY CAMEL COAT plays these white folks. #goodwife

JUST OVER HERE SCREAMING #TheGoodWife

Please send me all the gifs of that one scene from tonight's #TheGoodWife. You know the one.

Excuse me, I'm going to stay in that pillow & sheet fort for a while. A loooong while. #TheGoodWife
